room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Best escape room ever! Had such a blast!! And the owners are great! We did the Professor's Basement and we will definitely be back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Excellent escape room! We did The Professor's Basement - challenging puzzles (but not overwhelmingly so), great set up and production value, and wonderful staff. Had a fantastic time!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This place is fantastic! Our family came here and did the Professors Basement and had such a great time we came back and did the Sheriff's Office. Both rooms were so much fun for all of my family and we all contributed and haven't stopped talking about how fun it was. We are hooked on escape rooms now and Dave and the team here at UNLOCKED are great and have amazing customer service and really enjoy with they are doing here which makes it that much more fun. They gave us great hints and really kept the fun going! You really need to check this place out if is so much fun!
